full_text: Today one of our local sports clubs announced it's going to a have a new senior women's team!  Thank you to all @rosemountmulvey for working to make this possible; the club and community will be stronger for it!💪   #WomenInSport https://t.co/dJzMlM2nOy

I welcome @EamonRyan's announcement of €72.8m in new funding for rural cycling & walking infrastructure   This @greenparty_ie supported initiative is a huge step forward in green sustainable transport for Ireland and will also enhance rural Ireland's tourism offering https://t.co/bvRSJsKQjd

Fantastic @dubcitycouncil 🤩  A brilliant way to show the#BoysInGreen we're all behind them tonight as they take on Luxembourg!  Éire abú! 🇮🇪 Tá sibh go maith in ann acu 💪    #COYBIG #WeAreOne #IrlLux @fifaworldcup @FAIreland https://t.co/bkmQTiQIsR

Very touched to see that this evening’s performance by @RTE_NSO was dedicated to the memory of their late colleague Tom Briggs. My deepest condolences to Tom’s family and many friends. https://t.co/3bIWkvaQnl

This decision by the Beacon Hospital has caused much unnecessary hurt and anger  There are schools for children with special educational needs + many priority people nearby who need vaccines  How did no one involved see how wrong this was? It should never have happened. https://t.co/lyJSNtl5hq

On #DaffodilDay today I'd like to say thank you to all those who have volunteered over the years on this important fundraising day  Every family is affected by cancer and #Daffodil Day is @IrishCancerSoc's biggest fundraiser. Please consider donating if you can https://t.co/wCp3NhKA4M

We all miss music & live events. Their safe return is a priority for Government.   At today's meeting with @EIAIreland I discussed:   🎸my plans for the Return to Live Entertainment Working Group   🎸@EIAIreland's recent #LPSS webinar (linked below) which drew over 500 attendees https://t.co/E4XrWWaNyM

So many online events on this weekend @DeptCulturelRL including   #OUTingThePast  This festival celebrates LGBT+ history & activism and features a talk tomorrow with Prof @ruw_schulze   Mark it in the diary: tomorrow, Friday 4pm | @NMIreland https://t.co/XlYzg1NXVj https://t.co/jhD47PYrtI

.@riotsligo interrogates the role of culture in the development/regeneration of small cities   I was grateful to launch the online event this week and I'm excited to see the outcomes   I've no doubt they'll be imaginative & will lead the way for towns & small cities #WeAreCulture https://t.co/ILfjT3UmRI

I'm so sorry to hear of the passing of Noel "Nollaig" Bridgeman   He was one of Ireland's greatest ever drummers and had a profound influence on contemporary Irish music   My condolences to his family and friends  Ar dheis Dé go raibh a anam  #NoelBridgeman https://t.co/TEVN26YSbi

Today is a landmark day for @greenparty_ie   Govt approves #ClimateActionBill to 🟢help us meet 51% emissions reduction by 2030 🟢strengthen Climate Change Advisory Council 🟢support our transition to Net Zero by 2050 🟢embed carbon budgeting into law  https://t.co/35kDfvycqK https://t.co/nxJ9dIO8B4

On #WorldWaterDay I'd like to amplify the @greenparty_ie call for recognition of clean water as a human right  This is a Programme for Government commitment & my party colleague @roisingarvey will bring this motion to the Seanad next week https://t.co/DT6yffbnNv
